description: This file defines an asynchronous function to list recommendations from a database, with optional filtering by priority and resource_id, using SQLAlchemy in an async context.

methods.name: List[Recommendation] list_recommendations( session: AsyncSession, *, priority: Optional[str] = None, resource_id: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 100, )
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of Recommendation objects from the database, filtered optionally by priority and resource_id, with a limit on number of results.

ctags.name: list_recommendations
ctags.signature: ( session: AsyncSession, *, priority: Optional[str] = None, resource_id: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 100, )
